script_excerpt:
app.configure(() => {
  return [
    {
      type: 'switch',
      key: 'visible', // the key on `app.config` to set this value
      label: 'Original Butterfly Visible',
      options: [
        { label: 'True', value: 'true' },
        { label: 'False', value: 'false' }
      ],
      initial: 'true',
    },
    {
      type: 'section',
      key: 'area',
      label: 'Set the area size the Butterflies will spawn in (min 1x1m / max 1000x1000m)',
    },
    {
      key: "areaXZ",
      label: "spawn Area",
      type: "number",
      initial: 10,
      min: 1,
      max: 1000,
      step: 1,
    },
    {
      type: 'section',
      key: 'area_up',
      label: 'Set how high the butterflies will spawn in (min 1m / max 1000m on the Y axis)',
    },

      initial: 10,
      min: 1,
      max: 1000,
      step: 1,
    },

      label: 'Set the amount of butterflies (min 1 / max 5000)',
    },

      type: "number",
      initial: 50,

      max: 5000,
      step: 1,

      type: "number",

      max: 10,
      dp: 1,
      step: 0.1,
    },
    {

      key: "flapspeed_min",
      label: "Flap-speed Min",
      type: "number",
      initial: 8,
      min: 1,
      max: 50,
      step: 1,
    },
